column1: Please choose the following category that best fits the purpose of your website:
Commercial – the site was built to support a business or sell products or services
Civic – the site focuses on issues, politics, campaigns, advocacy groups, etc. that affect a larger group of people
Community – the site supports social activities such as hobbies, sports teams, entertainment, religious institutions, etc. (but not a for-profit business offering these activities)
Personal – the site focuses on me, my family, or my interests
What do use your website for the most?
Sales Orders – The website allows customers to place orders for physical goods
Bookings – The website allows clients to book services
Communications  – The website allows me to communicate updates, promotions, specials, etc. with my customers
Marketing and Credibility – The website helps me brand and have a digital presence
Operations – The website allows customers to access a web-portal, or allows employees to check schedules, change shifts, request time off, etc.
In total, how many employees are there working at your organization?
Which of the following, if any, are true of your business?
My business is currently registered as a limited liability corporation (LLC)
My business is currently registered as a sole proprietorship
My business is currently registered as a corporation (S or C)
My business is currently registered as a nonprofit
I have a “Doing Business As” (DBA) name
I have an employer identification number (EIN)
My business is not currently registered, but I am in the process of registering it
My business is not currently registered, and I do not intend to register it
None of these are true for my business
Thinking about the business or organization your website supports, where do you conduct business or services?
In which of the following geographical areas do your customers reside?
How many businesses do you currently own?
How many businesses have you started?
None - I didn't start this business
What would you say are the top 3 reasons you started your business?
I've always dreamed of starting a business
I wanted to be my own boss
I had an idea for a new product or service
My business supports a cause or hobby about which I am passionate
I was looking to make some extra money
I lost my prior job and needed to establish a new source of income
I wanted or needed the flexibility with my time that a typical job does not allow
I wanted to contribute to my community
I previously retired and started this business to stay active
I can have more success on my own
How many businesses that you’ve started did you sell or close?
Were you employed before you started your business?
Yes, I left my prior job to start my business
Yes, I started my business while still working elsewhere
No, I wasn't working because I was laid off or furloughed
No, I wasn't working at the time because I was a student
No, I wasn't working at the time for other reasons (retirement, parenting, disability, etc.)
What would you say were the three biggest challenges you faced when you first started the business?
Finding employees, independent contractors, or consultants with necessary skills
Getting my business website online effectively
Expertise on business planning and management
Rising costs on wages and materials
Marketing my business online (social media, ads, promotions, etc.)
Marketing my business using traditional media (print, radio, tv, etc.)
Getting my business social media accounts setup
Knowing what to do at each phase
How were the first dollars invested into the business?
Marketing my business online (social media, ads, promotions, etc.)
Marketing my business using traditional media (print, radio, tv, promotions, etc.)
Where did you make your first sale?
My first sale was made on my website
My first sale was made on social media
My first sale was made in a physical location
My first sale was made at an in-person event
My first sale was made over the phone or email
My first sale was made somewhere else
What was the total amount of capital needed to start your business or organization?
On a scale of 1 (very easy) to 7 (very hard), how easy or hard was it for you to access the capital you needed to start your business?
Recode: On a scale of 1 (very easy) to 7 (very hard), how easy or hard was it for you to access the capital you needed to start your business?
How were the most recent dollars invested into the business?
Marketing my business online (social media, ads, promotions, etc.)
Marketing my business using traditional media (print, radio, tv, promotions, etc.)
Do activities related to this website provide a source of income for you?
Yes, my main source of income
Yes, a supplemental source of income
No, I do not receive any income related to this website
If your business is only for supplemental income, do you hope it turns into your primary source of income?
What is the average monthly revenue for this business?
Approximately what percentage of your household income comes from your business?
Over the last 6 months, how has your business’ average monthly revenue changed?
How would you describe the current availability of cash on hand for this business, including any financial assistance or loans?
3 or more months of business operations
Has your business recently been affected by any of the following ?
Stress from environmental challenges, such as changes in household income or employment
What actions have you taken, or do you plan to take, in response to recent economic factors?
Reducing the number of my employees
Utilizing business assistance resources from the government or other organizations
Adjust my time spent on the business
Increase my online marketing efforts to attract new customers
Increase my traditional marketing efforts to attract new customers
Run promotions or campaigns to increase spending from my current customers
How many hours per week, on average, do you currently spend on your business?
Which of the following statements best describes your current employment situation?
I am fully employed by my business
I am employed full-time outside of my business
I am employed part-time outside of my business
Outside of my business, I am either a stay-at-home parent, a student, or unable to find work due to a disability
Outside of working on my business, retired
Outside of working on my business, I am unemployed
Which of the following statements best describes your ambitions for your business in the long term?
I aspire to be a solopreneur and stay small
I aspire to be a small business with some employees and/or a physical location
I aspire to be a mid-size business with several employees and/or multiple physical locations
I aspire to be a corporate business with a large employee base and headquarters
I want to become a unicorn; a company with more than a billion dollar valuation
Are you aware of business assistance funding or programs available to your business?
Please describe your awareness and use of programs from…
Aware of resources from my local government
Used resources from my local government
Not aware of resources from my local government
Aware of resources from the federal government
Used resources from the federal government
Not aware of resources from the federal government
Aware of resources from private (non-government) organizations
Not aware of resources from private (non-government) organizations
Aware of resources from other organizations (local accelerators, investment clubs, angel investors, etc.)
Used resources from other organizations (local accelerators, investment clubs, angel investors, etc.)
Not aware of resources from other organizations (local accelerators, investment clubs, angel investors, etc.)
What is your overall expectation for your business or organization  over the next 6 months?
What is your overall expectation for the national economy over the next 6 months?
We are interested in knowing more about our customers.  Please tell us which of the following best describes you:
With which race do you most identify?
Are you of Hispanic origin or descent, such as Mexican, Puerto Rican, Cuban, or some other Spanish background?
What is the last year of school or degree that you completed?
High school graduate (Grade 12 or GED certificate)
Technical, trade, or vocational school AFTER high school
Some college, no 4-year degree (including Associate's Degree)
College graduate (B.S., B.A., or other 4-year degree)
Graduate degree (Master's Degree or Ph.D.; law or medical school)
Which of the following ranges contains your age?
Which best describes your living situation?
I live in a home I own free and clear (without a mortgage)
I live in a home for which I maintain a mortgage
I rent the home or apartment in which I live
I live with friends or family with no rent expectation
How many children, adults, and seniors are in your household – including yourself?
What was your estimated household income last year (2022) before taxes? Please consider all sources of income.
